European AI Standards

This paper presents a systematic analysis of European technical standardization for organizations providing AI systems under the EU AI Act. It examines how companies are dealing with standardization and identifies key challenges such as effective implementation period, imbalance of participation, double regulation, and significant annual costs.

Key Concepts:

  • Technical standardization challenges
  • Industry sector analysis
  • Implementation period
  • Participation and influence in standardization committees
  • Art. 40(2)
  • Standardization request
  • European AI standardization challenges and opportuni- ties
  • Art. 40(3) AI Act
  • EU values
  • fundamental rights protection
EU AI Act standardization AI systems compliance sectoral standardization AI Act European Parliament Regulation (EU) 2024/1689 European standards
